Literature.Title: In vitro antifungal and fungicidal activities and erythrocyte toxicities of cyclic lipodepsinonapeptides produced by Pseudomonas syringae pv. syringae.
Literature.Author: Sorensen KN, Kim KH, Takemoto JY

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Candida albicans(MIC=3.2-12.5µg/ml),Candida kefyr(MIC=3.2µg/ml),Candida krusei(MIC=12.5-25µg/ml),Candida lusitaniae(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Candida parapsilosis(MIC=6.25-12.5µg/ml),Candida rugosa(MIC=3.2-25µg/ml),Candida tropicalis(MIC=3.2µg/ml),Cryptococcus neoformans(MIC=0.8-6.25µg/ml),Saccharomyces cerevisiae(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Aspergillus fumigatus(MIC=6.25-25µg/ml),Mucor sp.(MIC=6.25-100µg/ml),Microsporum sp.(MIC=25-200µg/ml),Trichophyton sp.(MIC=25-200µg/ml)
